articles.title: The 100 best songs of 2023 - The FADER
articles.description: From Sexyy Redd to Liturgy and Fever Ray to Ralphie Choo, these are the songs we loved in 2023.
articles.content: Since her days as half of Girlpool, Harmony Tividad has written songs that are wordy, esoteric, and mired in moral ambiguity. Faultline, one of her defining Girlpool songs, was also incredibly heavy,… [+500 chars]
